Join our community and start creating the future you want today wherever you find yourself!

item.title: Dreadlocks Saga: Achimota SHS Faces Another Lawsuit!
item.dc:creator: Joseph Anim Darko
item.description:
Oheneba Kwaku Nkrabea, one of the two dreadlocks students involved in the Achimota School admission saga has also sued the school over his rejection, following that of Tyrone Iras Marhguy. His plight to the court was to force Achimota School to admit him into the school for the purposes of his education. However, he is...

The post Dreadlocks Saga: Achimota SHS Faces Another Lawsuit! appeared first on The New Vibes.

item.description:
The Prestigious Achimota Senior High School has been sued for denying the dreadlocks student, Tyrone Iras Marhguy, admission...

item.title: Dreadlocks Saga; People Are Making Achimota School ‘Look Bad’… – Anonymous Comment
item.dc:creator: Joseph Anim Darko
item.description:
“Even if I were the headmistress of Achimota, I would do same probably, not because I want to, but I have been entrusted with a dress code I must uphold and until that dress code is amended, I cannot make an exception for one child at the expense of the code and be seen as one who is not firm...

The post Dreadlocks Saga; People Are Making Achimota School ‘Look Bad’… – Anonymous Comment appeared first on The New Vibes.

item.title: Dreadlocks Saga; Because Of Them We Can too…
item.dc:creator: Comfort Agbemafle
item.description:
The point is, when we speak against discrimination, it’s not because we just want to be difficult or unlawful. It is because it is the the right and humane thing to do. And more especially when it is of children at the center.

The post Dreadlocks Saga; Because Of Them We Can too… appeared first on The New Vibes.
